mapper.insert: insert into talk (share_id, talk_user_id, talk_user_name, talk_info, talk_creatime) values (#{share_id}, #{talk_user_id}, #{talk_user_name}, #{talk_info}, #{talk_creatime})
mapper.select: select talk_id, share_id, talk_user_id, talk_user_name, talk_info, talk_creatime from talk where share_id = #{share_id} order by talk_creatime desc
